Package system

package system
  • Class
    Description
    Const
    Constants that are used project-wide.
    GameClient
    Client class that contains the socket to used for communication to the server, as well as protocols for network messages.
    GameController
    Controller for the game, which calls methods in both the view and model.
    GameControllerListener
    Interface that handles network call/responses.
    GameModel
    Contains logic and objects/collectinos needed to process game logic.
    GameServer
    The server holds a Vector of sockets, representing each client connected to it.
    GameView
    The View, where all UI elements are generated and drawn.
    Main
    Calls main() function, which calls creates the GameController.
